comments: Hardaway Jr. (DAL) briefly has his arm around Adebayo's (MIA) upper half and slides it off in one continuous motion.
Finney-Smith (DAL) makes marginal body contact with Butler (MIA) after his gather.
Nunn (MIA) makes marginal contact with his right hand to Brunson's (DAL) front as they go over the pick.
Kleber (DAL) is retreating his arm into a vertical position as contact occurs with Butler (MIA) and Kleber absorbs the body contact during the driving shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) and Hardaway Jr. (DAL) engage and disengage off-ball without affecting the other's FOM.
Butler (MIA) turns and makes some body contact with Brunson (DAL) during his drive, but it is marginal.
Jones Jr. (MIA) is turning and delivers contact to Brunson (DAL) before he returns to the floor.
Finney-Smith (DAL) makes marginal body contact with Butler (MIA) as he drives into the lane.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) and Herro (MIA) make incidental foot-to-foot contact with one another along the perimeter.

Butler (MIA) gathers on his left foot while he is turning, he steps with his right and continues to pivot on his left foot, before jumping and releasing the pass before returning to the floor.  There is some slight pivot movement during his spin, but it remains in contact with the floor.
Porzingis (DAL) makes marginal contact with Adebayo's (MIA) front/side during the drive.
Kleber (DAL) establishes himself in a screening position in Nunn's (MIA) path and does not deliver the contact.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) makes marginal contact with Nunn (MIA) off-ball and doesn't affect his ability to defend.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) and Nunn (MIA) engage and disengage off-ball.
Butler (MIA) makes marginal contact with Brunson (DAL) prior to cleanly dislodging the ball at the end of his drive.

Brunson (DAL) initiates contact with Butler's (MIA) front/side as he attempts to get to the loose ball. After communicating with the Replay Center, it was determined that the foul committed by Brunson (DAL) on Butler (MIA) was a common foul.
Butler (MIA) has a marginal resting hand to Hardaway Jr.'s (DAL) side that he doesn't extend during the driving shot attempt.
Porzingis (DAL) makes incidental contact with Jones Jr. (MIA) during rebounding. After communicating with the Replay Center, it was determined that the call on the floor of MIA ball was confirmed.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact with the ball and blocks Porzingis' (DAL) shot before any Incidental contact.
Finney-Smith (DAL) makes marginal contact with Nunn's (MIA) backside before making clean contact with the ball during rebounding.
Finney-Smith (DAL) makes some contact with Butler's (MIA) left side at the end of his drive.
Porzingis (DAL) makes marginal body contact with Jones Jr. (MIA) that does not affect his ability to pass.
Kleber (DAL) initially makes marginal body contact with Adebayo (MIA), but as Kleber reaches with his arm to contest, he makes contact with Adebayo's forearm that affects his shot attempt.
Kleber (DAL) makes marginal contact with Adebayo's (MIA) right arm during the dunk attempt.
Kleber (DAL) establishes himself in a screening position in Jones Jr.'s (MIA) path and does not deliver the contact.
Nunn (MIA) and Brunson (DAL) engage and disengage during the inbound. Nunn subsequently makes marginal body contact with Kleber (DAL) thereafter.
Jones Jr. (MIA) initiates body contact with Kleber (DAL) that affects his SQBR.
Adebayo (MIA) makes incidental "high-five" contact with Porzingis (DAL) after the release of his jump shot attempt.
Finney-Smith (DAL) makes some contact with Herro's (MIA) front during rebounding, but it is marginal and Herro's momentum is naturally carrying him backward as he loses balance.
Herro (MIA) establishes himself in the front court within eight seconds.
Herro (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in Finney-Smith's (DAL) path and gives him the opportunity to get around the pick after initial contact takes place.

Nunn (MIA) initially moves along Brunson's (DAL) path. When Brunson stops and pump fakes, he draws Nunn towards him, resulting in body contact that occurs during Brunson's upward shooting motion.  Herro (MIA) does not make contact.
Brunson (DAL) makes some contact with Butler's (MIA) right arm during rebounding, but it is marginal and Butler quickly recovers the ball.
Finney-Smith (DAL) commits the take foul on Butler (MIA).
Porzingis (DAL) makes some contact with Adebayo's (MIA) front/side after initially making contact with the ball, but it is marginal.
Finney-Smith (DAL) commits the take foul on Butler (MIA).

Adebayo (MIA) fumbles the rebound and taps the ball without control to keep it inbounds before he steps out of bounds himself. Since Adebayo never established control of the ball, he can be the first to touch the ball once he has re-established his position on the court. Powell (DAL) subsequently knocks the ball out of Adebayo's hands and the ball is rewarded to MIA after review.
Curry (DAL) and Butler (MIA) engage and disengage during the inbound.
Brunson (DAL) makes contact across Butler's (MIA) arm as he receives the pass.
Kleber (DAL) commits the take foul on Jones Jr. (MIA).
